meanings.definition: The state of being inviolate or undisturbed.
meanings.sent1: The inviolateness of the ancient ruins was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The inviolateness of the forest was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: Despite the chaos around, the inviolateness of the library remained intact.
meanings.sent4: Her inviolateness in keeping her promises was like a shield against doubt.
meanings.sent5: The inviolateness of the oath was as unyielding as a mountain.

meanings.definition: The quality of being unbroken or intact.
meanings.sent1: The inviolateness of the glass sculpture was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The inviolateness of the vase made it a prized possession.
meanings.sent3: The inviolateness of the cake lasted until the kids found it.
meanings.sent4: The inviolateness of the melody touched the hearts of all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The inviolateness of the promise was like a beacon of hope in troubled times.
